questions.question: The death rate is the number of people that die in a year in a given country out of .....
The birth rate is the number of people that are born in a year in a given country out of .....
(Choose the false one)In the 18th.....

choices.answer: The death rate increased in Europe

questions.question: In the 18th century , the population increased in Europe because...

choices.answer: The death rate decreased and the birth rate increased
Many  people came to Europe  from America
The death rate increased and the birth rate decreased

questions.question: In the 18th , the population increased..... ( choose the one that is not true)

choices.answer: Because there was greater agricultural production
Because there was a general improvement in economy
Because there were fewer epidemies and diseases
Because the emigration of African people to Europe

questions.question: A greater population in Europe meant... (Choose the false one)

choices.answer: The need to increase agricultural production to get more food
The need to increase craft production( more  clothes, shoes, pots, pans...)
The need to have wars for the population to decrease

questions.question: To increase agricultural production... (Choose the false one)

choices.answer: More land was cleared for cultivation
New crops like potatoes and corn started being cultivated in Europe
New agricultural techniques like " the four year crop rotation" were introd
They continued using " the three years crop rotation" and leaving the land

questions.question: In the 18th century, the development of agriculture and manufacturing brought....(Choose the false one)

choices.answer: More importance of  international  colonial trade
Fewer products were sold in urban markets

questions.question: The system by which peasants peasants made craft products in their farms when they had free time was called...
In the domestic system peasants obtained the raw material....

choices.answer: Given by a merchant that went to the village with it
Given by the lord f the land
Bought by them in the city
Given by the parish priest ( herriko apaiza)

questions.question: ROYAL FACTORIES were big craftshops ( tailerrak) created by .....................to improve the economy of the country
In the 18th the bourgeoisie became wealthier investing in businesses like: (Choose the false one)
On the other side, in the 18th, the nobility that lived  from the profits of the manorial rents....
In the Ancien Regime, the source of wealth was ....

choices.answer: To make money from businesses like commerce
To be member of the clergy

questions.question: In the 18th century, the activities that became more important were....

choices.answer: the production of goods, trade (commerce) and capital (money)
to take part in political activities
to live from the rents of the lands

questions.question: In the 18th, the economic and social system based ownership as a source of wealth and privilege...

choices.answer: Fell, leading to the crisis of the Ancien Regime
Was replaced by a system based on the importance of being a noble
Continued, leading to the survival of the Ancien Regime

questions.question: In the 18th,the colonial trade based on triangular trade,between 3 continents that were..............,was very important
The extremely high financial benefits of the trade triangle favoured the development of... (Choose the false one)
The Atlantic ............. was an essential element in the triangular trade
From Europe to Africa ................  were taken
In ................ European manufactured goods were exchanged for slaves
Slaves were taken from Africa to the  Americas to be sold and forced to work  ......
The slaves were exchanged in America for ................... that were brought to Europe
Some of the raw materials that were brought from America to Europe in the triangular trade were not...
Some of the manufactured goods that were brought from Europe to Africa in the triangular trade were not...
From the 1650 to 1800 ................. of black slaves were taken from Africa to America
